attributes.action: grant upon jane Torvill and Christopher the honour of a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jane Torvill and Christopher Dean are our most successful ice dance skaters.  

At their peak they won the British, European, World and Olympic Championships, gaining the unprecedented score of 6.0 from each judge for their "Bolero"  routine.

After a period in retirement, they returned to skating, gaining Gold in the European Championship in 1994.

They have maintained a place of affection in the nations heart, as is evident by the response to their involvement in the ITV programme "Dancing on Ice".

The fact that the winning finalists of this programme get to dance the "Bolero" routine speaks for itself.

We have had many successful sportsmen and women awarded Knighthoods for their acheiements, but none have been as sussessful as this pair.

It is time they got the award they deserve.
